description: Describe Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an Amazon Web Services organization.

nested_items.name: autoEnable
nested_items.description: The scan types are automatically enabled for new members of your organization.

nested_items.name: ec2
nested_items.description: Represents whether Amazon EC2 scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

nested_items.name: ecr
nested_items.description: Represents whether Amazon ECR scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

nested_items.name: lambda
nested_items.description: Represents whether Amazon Web Services Lambda standard scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

nested_items.name: lambdaCode
nested_items.description: Represents whether Lambda code scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

nested_items.name: maxAccountLimitReached
nested_items.description: Represents whether your organization has reached the maximum Amazon Web Services account limit for Amazon Inspector.
